column2: BRIEF-Primerica Reports First Quarter 2020 Results April 29 (Reuters) - Primerica Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $1.95 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * COVID-19 PANDEMIC MAY ADVERSELY IMPACT FINANCIAL RESULTS IN NEAR-TERM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Primerica Reports Q4 Adjusted Operating Earnings Per Share $2.22 Feb 11 (Reuters) - Primerica Inc: * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $2.11 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * TERM LIFE INSURANCE NET PREMIUMS GROW 9%, ADJUSTED DIRECT PREMIUMS GROW 10% IN QUARTER * BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES 18% INCREASE IN DIVIDENDS TO $0.40 PER SHARE, PAYABLE ON MARCH 16, 2020 * BOARD APPROVES SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM TOTALING $300 MILLION THROUGH JUNE 2021; $250 MILLION IN REPURCHASES EXPECTED IN 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
BRIEF-Primerica Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.46 May 8 (Reuters) - Primerica Inc: * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.46 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
